children.text: Communication is the process of exchanging information on the Tonnus platform; that includes all messages about tasks, events in the company, as well as employee questions, leadership decisions, and so on. Each of these misc of messages falls under the umbrella of communication.
The communication policy permits:

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: Abiding by deadlines for completing tasks, thereby accelerating the company's development.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: Utilizing a single protocol for the entire company.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: Decisively resolving issues and improving the efficiency of company operations.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: Avoiding the accumulation of unfinished or overdue tasks that slow down the work of the team.
Task processing is available in the main menu of the Communications module.
My
All tasks assigned to a particular employee can be found in the “My” dashboard. This is the primary workspace for each user of the platform.
Any task in the “My” dashboard should be performed in accordance with the following policy:

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: A task that needs to be processed will be added to the “Incoming” list.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: If there are no questions regarding the content and deadline for the task, move it to the “Accepted” list. Complete the task in the “Accepted” list no later than the specified deadline.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: Move tasks that the sender has set a timeframe for to the “Pending list“ Tasks from the “Pending“ list must be completed no later than the specified deadline.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: Completed tasks in need of manager review will fall under the “Verification” list.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: If the manager approves the result, the completed task will be added to the “Done” list. Tasks that a manager hasn’t approved will be returned to “Pending” list for further work.
Supervised Tasks - “On control”
Tasks that you’ve assigned to someone within the system, as well as any tasks assigned to your subordinates will fall into the “On control” dashboard.

All tasks and routines created on your behalf will be displayed here. For example, if you manage a structural division, you will see all the tasks that you’ve assigned and your employees are performing in this list.

Lists in the "On control" dashboard are arranged according to the same principles as those in the “My“ dashboard. Tasks that assignees haven't yet processed go to the “Incoming" list. In the "Accepted" and "Pending" lists, you can see the tasks that employees are currently working on. Pay special attention to the "Verification" list. If it includes any tasks that require your review and approval, these must be processed within three days.
Watching
The “Watching” dashboard includes tasks in which you’re participating as an observer.
Lists in this dashboard are just like those in the ”On control” dashboard.

children.style: color: #000000;background-color: #FFFFFF;font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;font-size: 14px;
children.text: Sort and Filter

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: To find any created task, use the search bar in the top part of the screen.
Enter key words from the task name and choose the desired task from the list of search results.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: In the upper righthand corner of the screen, there is a button you can use to edit how tasks are displayed in the “My”, ”On control,” and “Watching” dashboard.
On pressing this button, a dropdown menu will appear with three different sorting methods

children.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
children.text: New First:
The newest tasks will be displayed at the top, while the oldest will appear at the bottom of the list.

children.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
children.text: Old First:
The oldest tasks will be displayed at the top, while the newest will appear at the bottom of the list

children.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
children.text: Close deadline First:
The tasks with the closest approaching deadlines will appear at the top, while each subsequent task will be listed in a descending order of urgency.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: You can also use

children.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
children.text: filters
when searching tasks.
When you press the funnel icon, a panel of filter settings will appear.

children.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
children.text: Sender:
This filter allows you to select one sender out of all those who have sent you tasks, such that when you look again at the “My” dashboard, you will only see tasks from the selected sender displayed.

children.style: font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;
children.text: Tasks with Violations:

This filter shows overdue tasks, tasks with a message that hasn't been answered within three hours, and tasks marked complete without proof of execution (as in, the results of these have not been received).
Label Meanings

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: When a task is not in progress, a yellow label will display on its card that says “Pending Acceptance.”

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: If a task has not been completed within the specified deadline, a red label reading “Expired” will be displayed on its card.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: If a task has been marked complete with a violation (results not received, proof of execution not attached), a red icon with an exclamation point will appear on the card. In such cases, check to make sure that the task has, in fact, been completed, and, as necessary, send it back for revision. DO NOT APPROVE tasks that have been performed with a violation of the communication policy!

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: If the sender has attached a message to the task, an envelope icon will appear on the card. A response to the message must be sent within three hours of receipt.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: If the sender has attached a message to the task, an envelope icon will appear on the card.

children.style: color: #000000;font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, Inter, "Segoe UI", Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif;

children.text: Labels when a task is not in progress.
